item.title: 1 second pause? (plz help)
item.dc:creator: @TaXaN TaXaN
item.description:
@TaXaN wrote:

Iv just made my own custom spell witch im very proud of,
but iv added 5 gfx and they all play at once,
i wanted to know what to put inbetween the code to put a 1 second gap before the next gfx starts

the code is:

stillgfx(88, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(342, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(433, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(432, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(187, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);

please can someone tell me the code if there is one

ty in advanced[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 10:40:28 AM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 10:43:18 AM[/size][hr]…
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 10:45:51 AM[/size][hr]is it even possible?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 10:46:23 AM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 10:47:19 AM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 10:48:01 AM[/size][hr]…

Read full topic
